Jackson will be joined by Aerosmith's Steven Tyler and singer Jennifer Lopez when the show returns next week, after Simon Cowell , Ellen DeGeneres , and Kara DioGuardi decided not to return for this year's series. Simon Cowell is irreplaceable, but people will be surprised to see that I'm very assertive this season, Jackson told PopEater, admitting that contestants have already dubbed him this year's meanest judge. The producer also revealed that the new judging panel have already had disagreements over which contestants to put through.

In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come,'' Eric Schmidt said. Page praised Eric Schmidt , too. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly, Page said.`` Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him.'' Watchers of the technology giant seemed to react mostly positively to news of the leadership shakeup.

and ended up in the Pro Bowl, a year-and-a-half after finishing a federal prison term for running a dogfighting ring.`` It's unbelievable,'' Michael Vick , 30, said on the NFL Network set. I have to give all glory to God. I thank my coaches and my teammates, they put me in this position. They got me better as an NFL player, as a quarterback and took advantage of my talents. I just can't say that enough. I hate to continue to say that and sound redundant, but it's the truth.
